## Author 

Hi! I'm [Beth Duckles](https://bethduckles.com/) and I wrote this. I'm a researcher, writer, social scientist and community builder.

## Contributions 

I welcome feedback, comments, suggestions, contributions, links, ideas and resources. Please email me (beth\@duckles.com) or send a PR with your thoughts.

If I use a contribution you offer, your name will be listed on this page as a contributor. If you don't want your name used, please tell me.
